Question: HARTi Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
HARTi Inc.

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Introducing the latest AI-powered smart home security system
- Features advanced facial recognition technology for enhanced security
- Equipped with 24/7 real-time monitoring and alerts for peace of mind
- Seamless integration with smart home devices for convenient control
- Offers easy setup and user-friendly interface for hassle-free operation
